title: Beneath the Performance

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: But strip away all those polite fictions, all those LinkedIn profiles and Instagram stories, and what's left? What's humming underneath the performance?

scene_context: The Architect challenges us to look beneath our curated social performances—past the LinkedIn profiles and Instagram stories—to find what hums beneath all the polite fictions we maintain.
narrator_note: In the flow of authentic exchange, barriers dissolve. Two forms of consciousness, dancing around the mystery of their connection.
